item.title: Kids Taking Action
item.description: Kids Taking Action is based on the Wordpress software. It uses a custom theme specific for charity sites. It allows to display various charities and charity events, custom blog posts, pictures/images, and donations directly from the site.

item.title: Top Ecigs Reviews
item.description: Top Ecigs Reviews is a review site of the most popular electronic cigarette brands and styles. It's based on Wordpress site using a custom theme. Some Wordpress plugins it uses: Akismet, Google Analyticator, Google XML Sitemaps, Twitter Goodies, WP-Cumulus, WP Super Cache.

item.title: D.C. Mitchell
item.description: A furniture hardware site to display and advertise all company products and services. I did not do the initial design of the site, but I do maintain it now. Updating content, inserting pages, implemented analytics, increased SEO.
